name: Pistol Guns & Ammo
description:
Pistol Gun Crafter
Gun weapon attack - this application simulation in which you will be able to shoot a real gun with real sounds! Feel like in a real war !

Appeal to both adults and children , because we all like to look like a weapon and what sounds are emitted ! Not important machine gun or grenade launcher is still a military technique! Allocate roles with friends and shoot each other !

Our application does not require an internet connection , which means you can play in any place in the school, in the subway , on the bus or even on the street!

Thanks for playing with us , please contact us with feedback and we will try to answer all !
